nl.weeaboo.vn.layout

Interface ILayoutElem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ILayoutGroup

    public interface ILayoutElem
extends java.io.Serializable

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LayoutSize calculateLayoutHeight(LayoutSizeType type, LayoutSize widthHint) 
      LayoutSize calculateLayoutWidth(LayoutSizeType type, LayoutSize heightHint) 
      nl.weeaboo.common.Rect2D getLayoutBounds()
      Returns the current position and size of this element within its parent layout.
      boolean isVisible() 
      void setLayoutBounds(nl.weeaboo.common.Rect2D rect)
      Positions this element within its parent's layout.

    • Method Detail

      • isVisible

        boolean isVisible()
        Returns:
        true if this element is currently visible. This information is used by the layout system to skip over invisible items without reserving room for them.

      • calculateLayoutWidth

        LayoutSize calculateLayoutWidth(LayoutSizeType type,
                                LayoutSize heightHint)
        Parameters:
        heightHint - The height for which to calculate the corresponding layout width. May be LayoutSize.INFINITE or LayoutSize.UNKNOWN, but never null.

      • calculateLayoutHeight

        LayoutSize calculateLayoutHeight(LayoutSizeType type,
                                 LayoutSize widthHint)
        Parameters:
        widthHint - The width for which to calculate the corresponding layout height. May be LayoutSize.INFINITE or LayoutSize.UNKNOWN, but never null.

      • getLayoutBounds

        nl.weeaboo.common.Rect2D getLayoutBounds()
        Returns the current position and size of this element within its parent layout.

      • setLayoutBounds

        void setLayoutBounds(nl.weeaboo.common.Rect2D rect)
        Positions this element within its parent's layout. This method is intended to only be called by the layout system.
